channel.title: PLEASE REPLY! How Do you Code ::Pickup In (All Items) + How you Change Max Cash
channel.description: Hey Guys Really Need Help Here How Do i Code ::Pickup I Want All Item Ids Please :) In and How Do i Change Max Cash From 999m to 2147m It will Be Very Appreciated :) Thanks Guy :D :)

item.title: PLEASE REPLY! How Do you Code ::Pickup In (All Items) + How you Change Max Cash
item.dc:creator: @the1337legend the1337legend
item.description:
@the1337legend wrote:

[quote=“B2300 T4nk, post:2, topic:295660”]You cant change max cash. Tried it and gave me a error because number was too large. And shouldnt the command ::pickup on the server?

If not here: [code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("You suck at spawning. Do it again ! ");
        }
    }

[/code][/quote]

LOOOOL of course you can change the max cash lmfao. you can do anything you want if you can “code” or use java properly

Read full topic
item.source: PLEASE REPLY! How Do you Code ::Pickup In (All Items) + How you Change Max Cash

item.title: PLEASE REPLY! How Do you Code ::Pickup In (All Items) + How you Change Max Cash
item.dc:creator: @K4rn4ge K4rn4ge
item.description:
@K4rn4ge wrote:

Either Do

::pickup 00995 50000

::pickup 0995 50000

hope that helps

(and you got a homiescape base or reapage, maybe even kingdoms hearts?)

item.title: PLEASE REPLY! How Do you Code ::Pickup In (All Items) + How you Change Max Cash

item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

You cant change max cash. Tried it and gave me a error because number was too large. And shouldnt the command ::pickup on the server?

If not here: [code] if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7, 12));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(13));

            if (newItemID <= 30000 && newItemID >= 0) {
                addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
            } else {
                sendMessage("That Item Doesn't Exist");
            }
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("You suck at spawning. Do it again ! ");
        }
    }

[/code]
